skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Dragon Slayer
skillTree.description: Slayers are constantly looking for the most glorious death in battle against the largest creatures, including dragons.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +10 for Slayer Units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Scarred, But Not Dead
skillTree.description: This drengi’s scars are so numerous that even the legends do not account for all of them. His skin has toughened beyond that of a normal dwarf, allowing him to battle through terrible wounds.

skillTree.name: Join My Legend
skillTree.description: Every dwarf child will hear of my tales. Perhaps there is room in a song for your names as well.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Doomseeker
skillTree.description: Wholly dedicated to destroying enemies of the dawi, wherever they may be.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: A Worthy Challenge
skillTree.description: Yes... YES! That one should do!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Against the Odds
skillTree.description: How could a solo combatant triumph against such odds again and again? He must be descended from Grimnir himself. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: We are the Elite
skillTree.description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +6% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Dwarven Wisdom
skillTree.description: I have fought trolls, giants, and yes, even a dragon. And you think a wazzok like you can slay me? Ha!

skillTree.name: Burn Pig Grease
skillTree.description: Wiping the sides of his blades through his slayer crest, the drengi can then ignite his az’s for even greater slaughter, especially against trolls.

effects.description:
Enemy vigour loss reduction: +5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy vigour loss reduction: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Honor Thungni
skillTree.description: Traditionally slayers worship Grimnir alone, but if on their quest they come across lost rune-weapons, they can honor the God of Runic Magic by slaying urks with a weapon of power.

effects.description:
Enemy spell resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy spell resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Wear Battle Trophies
skillTree.description: Slayers forsake any semblance of armor which might hamper their ability to kill. A nogarung for ale, and a few other skulls and bones commemorating past battles isn’t out of the question though.

skillTree.name: Battle Rhythm
skillTree.description: A veteran of countless battles, this drengi knows when to strike and when to breathe.

skillTree.name: A Good Day to Die
skillTree.description: A glorious death in battle, that is all a slayer desires. To see the end of a legend is inspiring to all dawi.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: A True Legend
backgroundSkills.description: Although it irks them, slayers of this renown attract a following of younger slayers, hoping to learn from them and follow in their great footsteps.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Slayer units
	(all armies factionwide)
Leadership aura size: +100% for Lords when attacking

Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for Slayers units
	(factionwide)
